 2003-14752003-09-30,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of JAMES M. SCHARFSTEIN of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
